area.name: Galaxy
area.path: s 2e 2s 6w n w n 3w n w n (Shadow Grove Entrance) from Edgar w n

mobiles.name: oldstyle poor mudder
mobiles.long_description: A poor mudder, lost in this place.
mobiles.description: You will become him if you are not careful.

mobiles.name: oldstyle star
mobiles.long_description: A beautiful white star smiles at you.
mobiles.description: You can't tell what the star looks like, she is too bright!

mobiles.name: oldstyle nebula young
mobiles.long_description: A young nebula, waiting to become a star.
mobiles.description: It hasn't got a definite shape, it is just a cloud of mist.

mobiles.name: oldstyle comet speedy
mobiles.long_description: A speedy comet is waiting to crush your head in.
mobiles.description: You see the offspring of Halley's comet, here just to wipe everything out.

mobiles.name: oldstyle red supergiant
mobiles.long_description: An enormous, red supergiant is forced to protect the galaxy.
mobiles.description:
You notice the giant is not as tough as his name sounds ...
Still he can be very powerful.

mobiles.name: oldstyle white dwarf
mobiles.long_description: A tiny white dwarf is trying to sneak away from duty.
mobiles.description:
Like the red giant, he is also appointed to stand guard for the galaxy.
But somehow he manages to escape.  Though tiny, it can take a lot of hits!

mobiles.name: oldstyle horsehead nebula
mobiles.long_description: A huge nebula is here, resembling a horsehead.
mobiles.description:
You can only make out its shape from the darkness.  He was cursed to stay in
here and his face may never be seen by anyone again.

mobiles.name: oldstyle andromeda
mobiles.long_description: The poor Andromeda is chained to the wall, suffering ...
mobiles.description:
She was once a princess of beauty.  However, her beauty has led to a Goddess's
jealousy and she has to suffer here endlessly until Perseus comes.

mobiles.name: oldstyle hercules
mobiles.long_description: The Mighty Hercules is working hard on his extra Labours for the Gods.
mobiles.description:
He has been put to do the Ten Labours -- ten impossible tasks, by Hera, the
queen goddess, who disliked him.  But he finished them all and at the end was
granted immortality. He is a very brave and strong fighter.

mobiles.name: oldstyle pegasus
mobiles.long_description: The wild pegasus is grazing peacefully.
mobiles.description: It is the legendary horse with wings on its back.

mobiles.name: oldstyle orion
mobiles.long_description: Orion is still hunting for Scorpio.
mobiles.description:
He is the legendary hunter who almost defeated Taurus the bull, but got
killed by Scorpio.  The gods put them both up as constellations but one
appears on one side of the sky and the other the other side so they will
never meet.

mobiles.name: oldstyle pleiades
mobiles.long_description: The Pleiades are here, weeping for the loss of their sisters.
mobiles.description:
These are the seven sisters of the Myths, and as for why they are here, no
one knows; even the Gods themselves have forgotten.

mobiles.name: oldstyle draco head
mobiles.long_description: The gigantic Head of Draco lurks out from beneath and prepares to roast you.
mobiles.description:
This evil-looking head is even larger than a giant.  He is the last guardian 
before entering the inner galaxy.  His neck is flexing in a random fashion so 
hitting the head is certainly not easy.

mobiles.name: oldstyle draco baby
mobiles.long_description: A baby draco is crawling on the Draco's body.
mobiles.description:
You see a tiny creature which looks like a dragon except that its body
resembles a snake.  Gosh, is this a draco, you wonder, is this the thing
we are on now?

mobiles.name: oldstyle aries
mobiles.long_description: Aries is sitting here, welcoming you.
mobiles.description:
You see a white goat here, the first guardian of the Zodiac,
also the ruler of Spring. He looks as if he is expecting you.

mobiles.name: oldstyle taurus
mobiles.long_description: Taurus wants to leave, but has been forced to stay as a guardian here.
mobiles.description:
You see a wild-looking bull with a bad temper.  He is well-built and looks like 
he can fight well ... indeed he has fought with Orion before and survived.

mobiles.name: oldstyle gemini
mobiles.long_description: Gemini is looking for his brother; have you seen him?
mobiles.description:
As soon as you see him you know that he is the most perfect man you have seen.
You can't find any imperfections on him.

mobiles.name: oldstyle gemini
mobiles.long_description: Gemini is hiding from his brother, grinning evilly at you.
mobiles.description:
As soon as you see him you see the most imperfect man you have ever seen.
How can there be such a contrast?  You wonder ...

mobiles.name: oldstyle cancer
mobiles.long_description: Cancer the crab is here, hoarding the treasure away from you.
mobiles.description:
You see a gigantic crab (YES, it is bigger than you!) with a crushed shell.
Legend is that he was crushed by Hercules when he was sent by Hera to kill him.
So Hera made Cancer a constellation for his work.

mobiles.name: oldstyle leo
mobiles.long_description: Leo the lion is roaring at you, ready for a strike!
mobiles.description:
His metallic skin means that he could be the one which was killed by Hercules
during his first Labour.  His skin is so weapon-proof that Hercules had to use
his bare hands to tear the lion into two from its mouth!

mobiles.name: oldstyle virgo
mobiles.long_description: Virgo is sitting here, winking at you suggestively ... you are alarmed!
mobiles.description:
From what you have seen, you now realize that legends are legends, and Virgo
may not be the maid of chastity and purity at all!  But still she looks
gorgeous and is waiting for your first move, whatever it is ...

mobiles.name: oldstyle libra
mobiles.long_description: Libra, the fair and just, is staring at you, weighing up the sins of your past.
mobiles.description:
He is a wise old man and can see people's thoughts through their eyes....
Now all he can see from you is greed and bloodshed.

mobiles.name: oldstyle scorpio
mobiles.long_description: Scorpio is moving his tail towards you, waiting to put an end to some mortals.
mobiles.description:
Ever since he killed Orion in the myths, he has been punished by having 
Sagittarius' arrow aimed at his heart forever.

mobiles.name: oldstyle sagittarius
mobiles.long_description: Sagittarius the centaur is waiting to let go of his well aimed arrow ...
mobiles.description: He is a centaur and a well trained archer. No one can escape his arrows.

mobiles.name: oldstyle capricorn
mobiles.long_description: Capricorn is here, feeling bored ... he wants a fight!
mobiles.description:
You see a mean-looking ram here.  He used to be a fierce fighter in the ancient
war but now the gods have decided to put him here, to live out the rest of his 
days in peace.

mobiles.name: oldstyle aquarius
mobiles.long_description: The beautiful Aquarius is standing here, holding THE vessel.
mobiles.description:
The pretty Water Bearer is smiling at you, you think you'd better give her a 
hand with holding the vessel.

mobiles.name: oldstyle pisces mermaid
mobiles.long_description: Pisces the mermaid is sitting here, waiting for your help.
mobiles.description:
She has been forced to serve her husband, who had been cursed to turn into a
fish and she deserves your pity.

mobiles.name: oldstyle pisces fish
mobiles.long_description: Pisces the fish, is jealous of your approach...
mobiles.description:
He was once a very handsome man but now has turned into an ugly big fish.
So he becomes jealous of any living thing which is more handsome than him.

mobiles.name: oldstyle bear ursa major
mobiles.long_description: Ursa Major the bear is the last defense against any intruders.
mobiles.description:
The Huge Bear which resides in the northern skies is here. 
You think you'd better turn back.  At least you have got a chance of survival.

mobiles.name: oldstyle cassiopeia queen
mobiles.long_description: Cassiopeia, the queen of the Universe, is sitting on her throne.
mobiles.description: She is the Queen of Dignity; facing her you feel all your dignity has gone.

mobiles.name: oldstyle cepheus king
mobiles.long_description: Cepheus, the king of the Universe, is sitting on his throne.
mobiles.description:
He is the King of Might as well as of the Universe. You suddenly feel very
weak and useless in front of him.

mobiles.name: oldstyle polaris polar star
mobiles.long_description: Polaris, the polar star, who commands the whole Universe, stands before you!
mobiles.description:
He is the Master of the Universe, (NOT He-Man!), the most powerful!  
Even the King and the Queen obey him.  As you look at him you notice he is 
actually a STAR, with dazzling bright light ... maybe you shouldn't have come
here at all?

objects.name: comet's tail
objects.description: A long, slender whip lies here.

objects.name: arm hercules
objects.short_description: the Titanic Arm plates of Hercules
objects.description: Arm plates of the Zodiac lie here.

extra_descriptions.description: These mighty armors have been worn by this immortal, since the ancient time.

objects.name: belt orion
objects.description: A belt of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You can immediately see that it belongs to Orion, from the three stars
engraved on it.

objects.name: skull draco
objects.description: A massive skull of a dead Draco lies here.

objects.name: fleece aries
objects.description: A fleece of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: From a look it resembles the Golden Fleece that exists in the Greek myths.

objects.name: hoof taurus
objects.description: A hoof of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: It is with these hooves that Taurus can stand against Orion's attacks.

objects.name: mask gemini
objects.description: A mask of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
You notice the mask has got two faces, one smiling and the other crying.
You don't know which way you should wear it.

objects.name: shell cancer
objects.description: A shell of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
A shell which is dented in the middle, resulting from the Hercules' mighty
pound when the Crab was still an enemy of Hercules in ancient times.

objects.name: skin leo
objects.description: A skin of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: A skin made of metal, which was worn by Hercules during his Ten Labours.

objects.name: bracelet virgo
objects.description: A bracelet of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: A bracelet of purity and youth, only worn by selected virgins.

objects.name: scale libra
objects.description: A shield of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: It is a shield of justice, used in the ancient battle against injustice.

objects.name: scale libra
objects.description: A shield of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: It is a shield of injustice, it picks on the innocent.

objects.name: sting scorpio
objects.description: Sting of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: This dreadful weapon put a lot of mortals to death before Scorpio was banished.

objects.name: arrow sagittarius
objects.description: The Arrow of Sagittarius lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: It's an arrow of lightning; it will never miss any target.

objects.name: bow sagittarius
objects.description: The Titanic Bow of Sagittarius lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: The gigantic bow used by the Archer; it is a very powerful weapon.

objects.name: horns capricon
objects.description: A pair of horns of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
These strange horns are the work of gods, shaped to fit on hands.
They look powerful indeed.

objects.name: vessel aquarius
objects.description: A vessel of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This vessel has been carried by the Water Bearer ever since she came to the
Zodiac.

objects.name: tail pisces
objects.description: A fish tail of the Zodiac lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This tail can actually be worn by mortals somehow as leggings ... another
work of the gods.

objects.name: ring dignity
objects.description: A ring of specialty lies here.

extra_descriptions.description:
This ring belongs to Cassiopeia, queen of the Universe.
Mortals, do not touch!

objects.name: sceptre might
objects.description: A sceptre of interest lies here.

extra_descriptions.description: You'd better give it back, or the king of the Universe will punish you.

objects.name: ring universe
objects.description: Here lies a fortune ... a small ring of power.

extra_descriptions.description: It conceals the power of the universe.

objects.name: great dipper
objects.short_description: the Great Dipper of the Skies
objects.description: A dazzling white object lies on the ground.

objects.name: spring shoot
objects.description: A shoot grows here, covered with dew.

objects.name: summer flower
objects.description: A flower grows here, waiting to be picked up.

objects.name: autumn leaf
objects.description: A leaf lies here, as if just fallen from a tree.

objects.name: winter branch
objects.description: A branch lies here, still covered with snow.

objects.name: chains andromeda
objects.description: Some chains lie on the floor.

extra_descriptions.description: They certainly look important!

rooms.name: Inside a Tavern
rooms.description:
You are inside a dimly-lit room.  The atmosphere makes you feel uncomfortable.
In front of you stands a mysterious gypsy.  She whispers 'Your fate and
destiny lie beyond this world.'  You are still wondering what she means when
you suddenly notice the crystal ball ... it glows fiercely and displays the
Universe!

rooms.name: Inside the Crystal Ball
rooms.description:
You have touched the crystal ball and find that you have gone inside it:
a world of stars and wonders!  As you look back you figure out there is no
choice but to go forward.

rooms.name: Inside the Galaxy
rooms.description:
You are now inside the galaxy, around you you see stars and nebulae smiling
at your presence, and comets and meteors wandering around you.  You realize
that this world may not be the true galaxy after all, but just another
fantasy zone.  Exits lie virtually in all directions.

rooms.name: On an InterGalactic Walkway
rooms.description:
You are on a well-paved path which seems that it was made deliberately for
visitors like you.  The walkway continues north and a small exit lies west.

rooms.name: End of the InterGalactic Walkway
rooms.description:
You notice the walkway has come to an abrupt end and you wonder why. You see
that there is still a small path which leads north and one to the west.
To the east lies a bridge.

rooms.name: At the Undeveloped Part of the Galaxy
rooms.description:
This place looks deserted, covered with space debris.  Not a sign of life
is around.

rooms.name: On the Bridge of Stars
rooms.description:
This bridge has been made by the stars to honour their ancestors.  The
bridge itself shines brightly and makes you feel that you are walking on
a path of light.  An entrance to an ancient building lies north and to
the east lies the Milky Way.

rooms.name: On the Bridge of Nebulae
rooms.description:
This bridge, like the other, was made as a memorial.  The nebulae had to
make one just to show that they are as capable as the stars.  North lies
a throne room.

rooms.name: The Throne Room of the Nebula King
rooms.description:
You can only faintly make out that it is a throne room as it is too
dark in here.  In the middle is an empty throne.  You wonder where
the King has gone, maybe he is hiding from you?

rooms.name: At the Start of the Milky Way
rooms.description:
It is here that the famous old Milky Way starts flowing.  You are surrounded
by streams of mist the moment you tread on it.  You can't see well in
here ... luckily you haven't fallen yet!

rooms.name: Along the Milky Way
rooms.description:
You are still travelling inside this path of mist.  You notice a small
opening to the east.

rooms.name: At the End of the Milky Way
rooms.description:
Just as you started enjoying this journey inside the mist, you have come to
the end of it.  West leads to a bridge and east leads to somewhere else.

rooms.name: A Small Clearing
rooms.description:
You are inside a small clearing.  You can see that there are signs of a
living creature nearby.

rooms.name: An Edge of the Galaxy
rooms.description:
You are on the very edge of the galaxy.  Nothing is here except that there
is a path which leads down.

rooms.name: Very Near to a Gigantic Star
rooms.description:
You are very near to a gigantic red star.  While you are still fascinated
by its beauty, the star keeps on growing ... suddenly you realize that you'd
better leave.

rooms.name: Too Bright to Tell
rooms.description:
Indeed it is too bright to tell.  Because what you are witnessing is the
rare event of a Supernova, how a star explodes itself into galactic dust.
You may find yourself lucky to witness this rare event but even luckier,
you have finally got out of this galaxy as your body turns into dust.
That really HURTS!

rooms.name: The Star Cluster
rooms.description:
You are inside the home of the stars.  All you can see around you are stars
and nothing else.  You eyes become pretty hurt as you look at them.

rooms.name: Another Edge of the Galaxy
rooms.description: This is another uninhabited place.  Exits lie north, east and south.

rooms.name: Corner of the Galaxy
rooms.description:
You wonder why the galaxy is limited.  All you have done in Astronomy
courses now prove worthless.  Well who told you to take one at the start?

rooms.name: Lost in Space
rooms.description:
You are now lost in space.  Compasses don't work here, sorry.  What's more
you can sense darkness engulfing you.  You'd better get out quick.

rooms.name: Black Hole
rooms.description:
Well you have chosen the wrong path, sorry.  Nothing can escape from this
monster, not even light.
PANIC!  You can't escape!

rooms.name: The Homes of the Pleiades
rooms.description: This is where the famous Seven Sisters live.  You'd better not disturb them.

rooms.name: Western Side of the Temple
rooms.description:
You are still wandering around this temple.  You notice exits lie in all
directions except west.

rooms.name: Orion's Hunting Lodge
rooms.description:
This is dedicated to the Great Hunter of all time -- Orion.
Scattered on the floor is the famous hunting equipment used by him.

rooms.name: Northern Side of the Temple
rooms.description:
You are still wandering around this temple.  You notice exits lie in all
directions except north.

rooms.name: The Offering Chamber
rooms.description:
This is the sacred offering chamber in which sacrifices are made.  You see a
young girl here, chained to the wall, as if she is waiting for execution.
You look up and realize the chains are sent down directly from above.
Below you recognize the temple of Thalos.

rooms.name: The Entrance of the Ancient Temple
rooms.description:
You have entered into this old temple, which was built originally for the gods
in Mount Olympia, but it is now deserted as someone took over this part of the
Universe.

rooms.name: Hercules' Mighty Throne
rooms.description:
You stand before the throne of a long-forgotten hero.  It is full of bounty
that he got from the Ten Labours.

rooms.name: Eastern Side of the Temple
rooms.description:
You are still wandering around this temple.  You notice exits lie in all
directions except east.

rooms.name: Perseus' Chamber
rooms.description:
It is the chamber of the prince, Perseus.  However, he seems not to be here.
Maybe he has gone to get Pegasus to save Andromeda?

rooms.name: On the Mystic Chains
rooms.description:
You are dangling on the chains.  You notice exits lie in all directions.
Up above you see the chains continue upwards.  But a forcefield prevents
you from going further upwards.

exits.exit_description: You see the forcefield of Spring.

rooms.name: On a Hill
rooms.description:
Suddenly you find yourself on a hillside.  As you look around, you notice
that Spring has descended upon you.

rooms.name: Inside a Spanish Bull-Ring
rooms.description:
You are inside what used to be a ground for bull fighting.  But you notice
there are no Matadors around.  Maybe they are all dead?

rooms.name: Inside a study
rooms.description:
This is a strange study. Besides the desks and chairs you also see a large
mirror in the middle.  So, you wonder, is this how you make a Gemini into
two Gemini?

rooms.name: Along the seashore
rooms.description:
You start to feel the heat of Summer.  Amongst the rocky beach you notice
hidden forms which could be camouflaged crabs.

rooms.name: Within the Deep Jungle
rooms.description:
Nearby you can hear the roar of an animal.  Peering through the dense
overgrowth you think you glimpse a pair of menacing eyes.

rooms.name: Inside a Luxurious Bedroom
rooms.description:
A peaceful feeling overtakes you.  You see a magnificent four-poster bed.
It's a double bed and there is only room for one more!  Well, what now ... ?

rooms.name: The Supreme Court
rooms.description:
You are standing inside the dock of a court.  You feel an overwhelming
sense of guilt and you want to protest your innocence!  You fear retribution
and feel yourself exposed, just like the trees in Autumn.

rooms.name: In the Dry Desert
rooms.description:
You are confused by the shifting sands around you.  Through the shimmering
heat you see the hazy outline of a giant scorpion ... is this a mirage?

rooms.name: In the Woods
rooms.description:
You find yourself in the center of a Centaurion hunting party.  You'd better
hide yourself before you become the 'center attraction'!

rooms.name: On a Mountain Peak
rooms.description:
You are on the highest peak of the Universe.  You look around and notice
clouds below you.  One of the clouds resembles a goat-like form.

rooms.name: Inside a Waterfall
rooms.description:
The noise is deafening.  You are about to take a drink when you realize
that the water is being poured out of a vessel of mind-boggling proportions!

rooms.name: Inside a Gigantic Clam
rooms.description:
You feel uneasy here as if some evil magic is being cast on you.
You suspect something fishy is going on in here.

rooms.name: End of the Mystic Chains
rooms.description:
You have reached the end of the mystic chains.  Looking up, you notice a
small landing on which you can climb.  However, there seems to be another
forcefield blocking your way.

exits.exit_description: You see the forcefield of Summer.
You see the forcefield of Spring.

rooms.name: On the Draco
rooms.description:
You realize you are standing on scaly ground.  As you wonder what the ground
is made of, you feel the ground move.

rooms.name: Tail of the Draco
rooms.description:
At last you realize that you are on a giant snake-like dragon called the
Draco, the guardian of the inner galaxy.  You realize that the Draco is
actually flying now!

rooms.name: Path of the Draco
rooms.description:
As you struggle along this scaly creature you realize that the only way
you can reach to the inner galaxy is by going all the way to the head.

rooms.name: Near the Legs of Draco
rooms.description:
You are approaching the leg part of this creature.  You look around and see
that the surrounding is all dark except for some faint lights from the
distant stars.

rooms.name: On the Back of Draco
rooms.description:
At last you are half way through this long, weary journey. You can see
the wings are to the east but it seems that another forcefield is in the way.

exits.exit_description: You see the forcefield of Autumn.

rooms.name: Between the Wings of Draco
rooms.description:
You hear some giant flapping sounds nearby.  You desperately try to get hold
of something as the forceful gusts sweep you away.

rooms.name: Near the Arms of Draco
rooms.description:
From above you can faintly make out the gigantic arms which extend far
beyond into the darkness.

rooms.name: On the Neck of Draco
rooms.description:
Your journey is now approaching the end.  However, this neck seems to be
endless.

rooms.name: Approaching the Head of Draco
rooms.description:
You have come to the end of Draco, but you can't find the head!
You see a forcefield to the south, some distance away, beyond reach.
If only the head were here ...

exits.exit_description: You see the forcefield of Winter.

rooms.name: At the Entrance of the Great Dipper
rooms.description:
Now you are in the innermost part of the galaxy.  What you are walking on now
is the path of the Great Dipper or the Plough.  You notice that there are
seven rooms in this zone, representing the seven stars of the Dipper.

exits.exit_description: You see the forcefield of Winter.

rooms.name: Cassiopeia's Throne
rooms.description:
This is the Throne room of the Queen of the Universe.  From here you can see
every star and constellation in the Universe.

rooms.name: Along the Path of the Dipper
rooms.description: You see stars around you but nothing of special interest.

rooms.name: Cepheus' Throne
rooms.description:
This is the Throne room of the King of the Universe.  From here you can see
every star and constellation in the Universe.

rooms.name: Along the path of the Dipper
rooms.description: You see stars around you but nothing of special interest.

rooms.name: Along the path of the Dipper
rooms.description: You see stars around you but nothing of special interest.

rooms.name: End of the Dipper
rooms.description:
You have finished the path of the Dipper.  Here, the most prominent feature
is a set of claw-marks.  You also notice a room to the south; it looks as
if Polaris could lie here.

rooms.name: The Polar Star
rooms.description:
You have entered the private chamber of Polaris.  This is a room of great
significance.  You can see a powerful telescope pointing down towards the
Universe (SNOOPING!).  It is from here that Polaris commands the Universe.
You feel you have come to end of your search in this galaxy ...
